item.title: 新加坡努力清理油轮事故后长达 30 公里的油污
item.description: 与新加坡度假胜地圣淘沙岛上昂贵的海滨飞地的大多数居民一样，奥德兰-多德的周末也是在油烟的恶臭中开始的。【原文：Like most residents in Singapore’s expensive seaside enclave on the resort island of Sentosa, Odhran Dodd’s weekend began with the stink of oil fumes.】

item.title: 勒庞称她已准备好在法国与马克龙并肩作战
item.description: 法国极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）表示，如果她赢得本月晚些时候开始的议会临时选举，她不会试图赶走总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）。【原文：Marine Le Pen, the leader of the French far-right, said she won’t try to push out President Emmanuel Macron if she wins the snap parliamentary election that begins later this month.】

item.title: 南苏丹税务纠纷导致肯尼亚港口货物运输延误：《标准报
item.description: 据《标准报》报道，由于对新的强制性税收存在争议，运往南苏丹的货物在肯尼亚蒙巴萨港堆积如山。【原文：Cargo heading to South Sudan is piling up at the Port of Mombasa in Kenya due to a dispute over a new mandatory tax, the Standard reported.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：塞尔维亚可能允许力拓重启锂项目
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，在亚历山大-武契奇（Aleksandar Vucic）总统的执政党在最近的选举中巩固了权力之后，塞尔维亚可能很快就让力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）恢复在这个巴尔干国家开设锂矿的筹备工作。【原文：Serbia may soon let Rio Tinto Plc resume preparations for opening a lithium mine in the Balkan country, after the ruling party of President Aleksandar Vucic consolidated power in recent elections, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 印度正在与挪威 Equinor 公司谈判石油储备：造币厂
item.description: 据《造币厂报》报道，印度正在与挪威埃奎诺公司（Equinor ASA）就其参与印度战略石油储备以及该公司在美国和卡塔尔的长期液化天然气交易进行谈判。【原文：India is in talks with Norway’s Equinor ASA for its participation in the country’s strategic petroleum reserves, as well as for long-term liquefied natural gas deals from the company’s US and Qatar portfolios, the Mint newspaper reported.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦将提高电价，这是确保获得国际货币基金组织贷款的关键举措
item.description: 巴基斯坦正在将电价平均提高 20%，以增加从国际货币基金组织获得新贷款的机会。【原文：Pakistan is raising power prices by an average 20% to bolster its chances of securing a new loan from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 以色列军队宣布暂停在加沙南部的行动以促进援助物资的运送
item.description: 以色列军方表示，加沙地带南部每天将有几个小时的 "战术性暂停"，以增加人道主义援助的运送，这是自11月停火以来军方首次强制停止战斗。【原文：The Israeli military said there will be a ‘tactical pause’ for several hours every day in the southern Gaza Strip to increase the delivery of humanitarian aid, the first time the army has enforced a halt in fighting since a November cease-fire.】

item.title: 韩国希望通过出售美元债券筹集最多 13 亿美元资金
item.description: 韩国周日表示，该国计划在一次美元债券销售中筹集多达 13 亿美元的资金，目的是为当地公司设定一个稳定的参考汇率，而此时韩国自身的债券发行量也接近创纪录的水平。【原文：South Korea said Sunday it’s planning to raise as much as $1.3 billion in a dollar bond sale meant to set a stable reference rate for local companies, just as their own issuance climbs near a record.】

item.title: 韩国承诺采取措施抑制韩元升值带来的过度波动
item.description: 随着韩国从下月起延长韩元的交易时间，韩国承诺将采取干预措施抑制韩元的任何波动。【原文：South Korea pledged to intervene to curb any volatility in the won as the nation extends trading hours for the currency starting next month.】

item.title: 朝日新闻》称日本将考虑允许扩建核电站
item.description: 据《朝日新闻》报道，日本经济部正在考虑允许在老核电站退役的同时扩建核电站。【原文：Japan’s economy ministry is considering allowing the expansion of nuclear plants as older ones are being decommissioned, according to the Asahi newspaper.】

item.title: 上海太阳能嘉年华揭示中国清洁能源旗舰产业的生存之战
item.description: 世界上最大的太阳能展示会的参观者可能没有意识到中国清洁能源旗舰产业的状况有多么糟糕。【原文：Visitors to the world’s biggest showcase of solar power could be forgiven for not realizing just how dismal conditions are in China’s flagship clean energy industry.】

item.title: 受胡塞武装影响的货船船员因火灾弃船
item.description: 美国军方称，一艘被胡塞武装导弹击中的散装货船在无法控制船上火势后于周六弃船。【原文：Crew members of a bulk cargo carrier struck by Houthi missiles abandoned ship Saturday after they couldn’t get fires on board under control, the US military said.】

item.title: 阿根廷工会举行罢工，影响瓦卡穆埃尔塔生产
item.description: 阿根廷一个石油工会表示将举行 48 小时罢工，要求提高工资，这可能会影响瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区的生产。【原文：An Argentinian oil union said it will hold a 48-hour strike to demand higher salaries, potentially affecting production at the Vaca Muerta shale patch.】

item.title: Electrek 称特斯拉 Cybertruck 因雨刷问题延迟交付
item.description: 据 Electrek 报道，由于挡风玻璃雨刷器出现问题，特斯拉公司已停止 Cybertruck 的交付。【原文：Tesla Inc. has halted Cybertruck deliveries because of a problem with its windshield wiper, Electrek reported.】

item.title: 全球降息巨轮艰难起步
item.description: 对加入全球降息周期持谨慎态度的各国央行，本周可能会在发达经济体的四项决定中露面。【原文：Central banks cagey about joining the global interest-rate cutting cycle may reveal themselves this week with a quartet of decisions in advanced economies.】

item.title: 李克强开启澳大利亚之行，象征意义掩盖紧张局势
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强开始了北京高级领导人自2017年以来对澳大利亚的首次访问，这表明在亚太地区安全紧张局势升级之际，两国关系得到了改善。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang has begun the first visit to Australia by a senior Beijing leader since 2017, signaling improved ties between the two nations at a time of escalating security tensions in the Asia-Pacific region.】

item.title: 加拿大能源枢纽在水管破裂后宣布进入紧急状态
item.description: 卡尔加里是加拿大石油和天然气工业的中心，在发现修复一条主要破损水管所需的时间超过预期后，卡尔加里宣布进入紧急状态。【原文：Calgary, the center of the Canadian oil and gas industry, declared a state of emergency after discovering that repairs on a major broken water main will take longer than expected.】

item.title: 拉加德敦促各国政府遵守全球贸易规则
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，世界有可能出现新的 "地缘政治鸿沟"，并敦促各国政府尊重国际贸易规则。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said the world risks a new “geopolitical divide” and urged governments to respect international trade rules.】

item.title: Greencore 因大肠杆菌问题召回三明治、卷饼和沙拉
item.description: 由于担心可能受到大肠杆菌污染，方便食品制造商 Greencore 集团正在召回多种产品。【原文：Convenience foods manufacturer Greencore Group is recalling a variety of products because of concerns over possible contamination with E. coli.】

item.title: 加密初创企业融资额突破千亿美元大关
item.description: 自该行业成立以来，加密初创企业已经吸引了大约 1000 亿美元的风险投资，而最近的投资回升恰好与比特币和其他主要代币的涨势相吻合。【原文：Crypto startups have drawn in roughly $100 billion of venture funding since the industry’s inception, after a recent pick-up in investment that coincided with a rally in Bitcoin and other major tokens.】

item.title: 卢拉称税收斗争并未削弱巴西财政部长的能力
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva）否认财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）在国会拒绝就一项被认为对国家财政平衡至关重要的临时措施采取行动后被削弱。【原文：Brazil’s President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva denied that Finance Minister Fernando Haddad was weakened after Congress refused to act on a provisional measure considered crucial for the country’s fiscal balance.】

item.title: 梅洛尼利用七国集团会议关注全球南部和她自己
item.description: 这是乔治亚-梅洛尼的表演，她让每个人都知道这一点。当政治伤员回家时，首次担任七国集团主持人的意大利总理与全球南方国家的领导人在一起显得更加从容。【原文：It was Giorgia Meloni’s show and she made sure everyone knew it. As the politically wounded went home, the Italian prime minister making her debut as a Group of Seven host looked more at ease with the leaders of the Global South.】

item.title: 市场对美联储有关利率的言论不屑一顾
item.description: 华尔街的箴言警告人们 "永远不要与美联储作对"。但这正是交易员们正在做的，这可能会引发股市中一些被遗忘角落的反弹。【原文：The Wall Street axiom warns to “never fight the Fed.” But that’s exactly what traders are doing, and it could spark a rally in some of the forgotten corners of the stock market.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫 2.62 亿美元的收入引发了 "备忘录股票 "时代的怀疑论者
item.description: 当 GameStop 公司的热潮再次袭来的时候，交易影响者基思-吉尔的粉丝们等待着一个时刻的到来：他们的英雄，又名 "咆哮的凯蒂猫"，又名 "深度价值"（Deep F—-ing Value），终有一天会成为亿万富翁。【原文：As a renewed bout of GameStop Corp. fever gripped the meme-stock faithful, fans of trading influencer Keith Gill waited for one moment: The day their hero, aka “Roaring Kitty,” aka “Deep F—-ing Value,” would become a billionaire.】

item.title: 土耳其埃尔多安认为利率 "上调 "将改善通胀状况
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）表示，随着国家在利率方面采取 "措施"，今年最后一个季度的通胀前景将进一步改善。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan says the inflation outlook will improve even further in the final quarter of the year as the country takes “steps” on interest rates.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀率因食品成本攀升至 28 年新高
item.description: 由于食品、房租和运输价格上涨，尼日利亚 5 月份的通货膨胀率攀升至 28 年来的最高点。【原文：Nigeria’s inflation rate climbed to a more than 28-year high in May on higher food, rent and transport prices.】

item.title: 萨默斯称特朗普的经济理念是他所见过的通胀最严重的理念
item.description:

item.title: 战争、金钱、石油和阿美石油公司巨额股票销售的形成
item.description: 6 月初，全球最大石油公司的老板飞往世界各地，为近年来最大的一次股票出售活动吸引投资者的兴趣，他可以松一口气了。【原文：As the boss of the world’s biggest oil company flew around the world in early June to drum up investor interest in one of the biggest share sales in recent years, he could breathe a sigh of relief.】

item.title: 阿布扎比寻求通过农业为经济增加 250 亿美元收入
item.description: 阿布扎比希望通过一个新成立的以农业增长和水资源安全为重点的部门，到 2045 年使其国内生产总值再增加 250 亿美元。【原文：Abu Dhabi is looking to add an additional $25 billion to its gross domestic product by 2045 through a newly launched unit focused on agriculture growth and water security.】

item.title: 卡扎克称欧洲央行的通胀问题不能拖到 2026 年
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲中央银行决不能让通胀率在2026年继续保持在2%以上，因为预测显示，现在只有到明年年底才能实现这一目标。【原文：The European Central Bank mustn’t allow inflation to remain above 2% into 2026, Governing Council Martins Kazaks said after projections showed that target will now only be met toward the end of next year.】
